hero.name: Abhishek
hero.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
hero.description: 4+ years of experience building scalable web applications, passionate about clean code, system design, and solving real-world problems.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.description1: I'm a passionate developer with expertise in modern web technologies and mobile app development. I love creating solutions that make a real difference in people's lives.
about.description2: With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I enjoy working on diverse projects that challenge me to grow and learn new skills.

frontend.description: Creating beautiful and responsive user interfaces

projects.title: My
projects.subtitle: Some of my recent work and personal projects

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with modern UI, payment integration, and admin dashboard. It was one of the India's largest Omni-channel platforms.

extension.title: Platform Extension
extension.description: A productivity platform extension. This extension was a MEVN Stack project adding additional functionality to an existing platform as per client requirements. It plays a very vital role in managing business and their custom requirements

mobile.title: Mobile App
mobile.description: Worked on various cross-platform mobile application for task management with real-time synchronization. Used React Native and worked in these domains - healthcare, finance, and education.
